column4: Places - Connect to Network share, I believe.... Not on English Ubuntu so not sure about the proper translation
already tried that, it says it cant mount it
Hmm, should just work... but perhaps you have to install smbfs first. Open a terminal and type "sudo apt-get install smbfs"
ok, doing that right now hateball
You can also access samba shares from Nautilus by entering "smbfs://ip.to.server/share" in the adress field
after sudo apt-get install smbfs should i be able to use Places - Connect to Network share hateball?
yeah that should work, as well as what I typed about nautilus

browser

in the meanwhile i have another question about flash
cant make youtube work, i already installed the flash plugin
from FF
cant make youtube work, i already installed the flash plugin from firefox. Any hints?
Make sure you dont have different plugins installed at a time, like swfdec and Adobe flash. Use one or the other
i may have installed flash from adobe home page, i installed the .deb file but it didnt work, then i tried downloading directly from FF, same result
The deb file from Adobe doesnt work.  open a terminal and "sudo apt-get remove swfdec-mozilla gnash" && "sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree"
make sure to close/restart Firefox while doing so
